name: svbstrate-dev
description: The dev environment to build Svbstrate

scripts.start: npm run css:build ; npm run css:watch
scripts.css:build:
node-sass style.scss style.css && echo '
Svbstrate built successfully!'
scripts.css:minify:
node-sass style.scss style.css && minify style.css && echo '
Svbstrate minified successfully!'

author: estrattonbailey
